audioText: Quand j'étais enfant, je rêvais de devenir astronaute chaque nuit.
question: What did this person dream about as a child?
explanation: The text states 'Quand j'étais enfant, je rêvais de devenir astronaute chaque nuit' - When I was a child, I dreamed of becoming an astronaut every night. 'Rêvais' is the first person singular imperfect of 'rêver' (to dream).
